title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-2.4 - Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-2.4 - Permits

State Regulations

No person shall operate or engage in any new recreational
activity or use without first obtaining a special permit from the commission
pursuant to Subpart 646-1 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
